document.discussion_title: [ Books & Authors ] Open Question : I'm a 14 year old girl looking for a good book to read, I'm interested in really anything so if you have any suggestions please tell me?
document.topic_text: I'm a 14 year old girl looking for a good book to read, I'm interested in really anything so if you have any suggestions please tell me? 1 following For Couples Only by Shaunti Feldhahn; The Yoga of Nutrition; The Answer You're Looking for Is inside You; Bridge to Terabithia; How to Win Friends and Influence People; Golden Rules for Everyday Life. j · 1 day ago · just now Report Abuse Pride and Prejudice By:Jane Austen - Two extremely stubborn people hate each other and end up falling in love. Harry Potter Series By:J.K. Rowling - an orphan lives with his awful aunt and uncle but discovers he's a wizard. He goes to a wizard school and attempts to defeat the unstoppable evil wizard who killed his parents. Lord of The Rings Trilogy By:J.R.R Tolkien - a ring of power was created and an evil wizard now rules with it. It must be destroyed before he takes completely over the world Oogy By:Larry Levin - (true story) bait dog finds a happy family even though he was considered very ugly The Narnia Series By:C.S. Lewis - children find a magical world where Aslan, a great lion, reigns. They help to keep peace and keep the evil queen away. Sherlock Holmes By:Arthur Conan Doyle - a detective and his friend solve unusual mysteries. Return to Harmony By:Janette Oke - two best friends go their separate ways because of many trials in their lives. Audrey · 5 hours ago
